Why should you buy from Houseplansdirect?

carousel title

from 76 reviews
Excellent!

Excellent! Helpful and accessible.
Andy helps throughout the whole process with excellent ideas and knowledge.
Great ideas tailored to the individual ideas of the client. Highly recommended .

Rob (DIY projects wales)
Houseplansdirect
11/01/2022
good service

i received exactly what i asked for

Raymomd Firth
Houseplansdirect
10/26/2022
Sample looks good

I only downloaded a free sample of the building regs notes and they looked pretty good from what I could see. I have no doubt I will purchase the full version in the near future when I have a project next come up or possibly before hand.

Steve W
Houseplansdirect
10/19/2022
Great Excel yet simple document

Great Excel yet simple document for preparation of schedule of works

Kathleen
Houseplansdirect
08/01/2022
Good quality service

Good quality service with up to date information. Working for myself this is a good secondary source of information to use and add to my existing specifications

Anthony Given
Houseplansdirect
07/27/2022

prompt and efficient service

Dr Joan
Houseplansdirect
03/21/2022
So far so good

So far so good, havent had the plans yet, but seen obliging in changing details on the set plans

Peter Burke
Houseplansdirect
03/19/2022
Excellent

Excellent plans

david marshall
Houseplansdirect
03/05/2022
I needed info

I needed information for a course I was doing and this helped me to no end!

Sebastian Taylor
Houseplansdirect
01/14/2022
I would recommend their service

I would recommend their service. they are professional, helpful, and nothing is too much trouble. Since my first project I have used them again on a barn conversion.

I highly recommend this company.

christina young
Houseplansdirect
10/07/2021
It's a great site

It's a great site, there is so much choice of plans, a plan for everyone, from tiny homes to xl homes, and a great selection of styles to chose from, I give this 5*.

David Gould
Houseplansdirect
10/01/2021
Will definitely use

Will definitely use excellent service saving us a lot of money

heather
Houseplansdirect
08/24/2021
These plans provide the perfect

These plans provide the perfect starting point for planning applications.

mark barton
Houseplansdirect
07/09/2021

Very useful plans

Jack Raftree
Houseplansdirect
05/18/2021
Comprehensive and worthwhile.

A very comprehensive specification that should cover all areas of concern as governed by various Local Authorities and Building Control regarding small scale residential building. With various methods of construction noted, while understandably not being able to make provision for the limitless variations possible, it nonetheless provides a solid basis from which specifications can be altered or added. A very helpful and worthwhile resource at reasonable cost.

Benjamin Abbott
Houseplansdirect
05/17/2021
See more reviews

How Our Process Works:

Hot Off The Press – Our Trending House Plans:

  • The Ledbury
  • The Pembridge
  • The Vowchurch
  • The Bodenham
  • The Sollars
  • The Churchfield
  • The Burleygate
  • The Delacy

Need some garage plans?

We also offer ready-made single and double garage plans, which you can download instantly and submit for planning and building regulations.

View Garage Plans

Our ready-made house plans and designs have been helping customers bring their dream home within reach since 2008.

Whether you’re looking to build a new home, remodel an existing home, or are just looking for ideas, we provide high quality house designs, architectural resources and no-obligation advice to make it possible. You don’t always have to start from scratch!

Houseplansdirect offers a 14-day money back guarantee, for your peace of mind.

Our Resource Centre is a one-stop information shop for professionals and self-builders alike.

Whether you’re looking for new home specification templates, building regulations notes, design guides or standard detail drawings, you will find plenty of interest in our Resource Centre. We also have some free tips and guides for those who are new to self building. 

View our Resource Center

Most Popular Resources

We don’t just offer high quality house plans – we also have a continually growing collection of resources for anyone with an interest in house building.

  • Building Regulations Accompanying Notes
  • Detailed Specification of Building Works
  • New Home Specification (Abridged)
  • 10 Design Mistakes Self Builders Make: A Free Guide

Why Houseplansdirect?

Our house plans are the product of more than 40 years in the housebuilding industry, and are already designed with UK building regulations compliance in mind. Our designers also create custom house plans and house designs, and offer planning application and building regulations services, so we will help you every step of the way.

All of our house plans and house designs are unique, so you won’t find lots of different variants of the same house plans cluttering our site. Houseplansdirect simply provide the blueprint for you to customise and create the home you’ve always wanted.

Planning Application Services
Building Regulations Services

Want to customise one of our house plans?

Check out our video for some inspiration. We can amend any design to change the roof style, windows, external finishes and increase or reduce the floor area. So if one of our house plans is almost right but needs a few tweaks, that’s no problem!

Create Your Dream Home

But house plans are not all we do!

We offer completely independent advice throughout the house design process to help you achieve the home you want. Regardless of whether you’re adapting one of our classic British house plans to make it more contemporary, applying renewable energy technology to one of our more modern house designs, or want to create your own Grand Design from scratch, we can draw on more than 40 years’ experience to help you find the solution that works for you.

Featured on BBC’s “Escape to the Country”

At HOUSEPLANSDIRECT, we contribute 0.5% of our revenue to carbon removal. Find out more about our contribution as a Stripe Climate member here.

Partners / Affiliations
